errors.name: NoTokensAvailable
errors.msg: No tokens available. User has to wait for the next distribution or deposits sol to the lottery pool.

errors.name: TooMuchSolRequired
errors.msg: slippage: Too much SOL required to buy the given amount of tokens..

errors.name: SolReturnedNotEnough
errors.msg: slippage: Not enough SOL returned to sell the given amount of tokens..

errors.name: BondingCurveComplete
errors.msg: The bonding curve has completed and liquidity migrated to raydium..

errors.name: BondingCurveNotComplete
errors.msg: The bonding curve has not completed yet

errors.name: NoParticipationFound
errors.msg: No participation found for this user

errors.name: InvalidRewardMint
errors.msg: Invalid reward token mint specified for the lottery pool.

errors.name: LotteryNotYetEnded
errors.msg: Lottery round has not yet ended.

errors.name: WinnerAlreadySet
errors.msg: Winner for the current lottery round has already been set.

errors.name: WinnerNotSet
errors.msg: Winner has not been set yet

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow or underflow.

errors.name: NoSolInLottery
errors.msg: There is no SOL currently staked in the lottery pool for a draw.

errors.name: NoSolToWithdraw
errors.msg: All SOL deposited by the participant has already been withdrawn.

errors.name: InsufficientSolToWithdraw
errors.msg: Insufficient SOL available to withdraw for the participant.

errors.name: NoParticipants
errors.msg: No active participants found for the lottery draw.

errors.name: RandomnessGenerationFailed
errors.msg: Failed to generate randomness for winner selection.

errors.name: WinnerSelectionFailed
errors.msg: Failed to select a winner from the participants.

errors.name: InsufficientFundsForLotteryTurn
errors.msg: Insufficient funds for the current lottery turn based on initial contribution.

errors.name: AlreadyWithdrawn
errors.msg: Participant has already withdrawn their funds.

errors.name: AssociatedTokenAccountCreationFailed
errors.msg: Failed to create associated token account.

errors.name: InvalidLotteryDuration
errors.msg: Lottery duration must be a positive value.

errors.name: InvalidDistributionInterval
errors.msg: Lottery distribution interval must be a positive value.

errors.name: MaxMarketCapLevelsReached
errors.msg: The number of market cap levels has reached its limit.

errors.name: ZeroLengthParticipantData
errors.msg: Participant data has zero length which is invalid.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: User is not authorized to perform this action.

errors.name: InvalidAmountOut
errors.msg: Invalid calculation for token amount out.

errors.name: InvalidAmountIn
errors.msg: Invalid calculation for SOL amount in.

errors.name: ReferralSameAsFeeRecipient
errors.msg: Referral account is the same as fee recipient.
